metadata.title: CVE-2019-6460 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in GNU Recutils 1.8. There is a NULL pointerdereference in the function rec_field_set_name() in the file rec-field.c inlibrec.a.

criterions.comment: recutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
